data.event: In the 2000 census Beaconsfield had the dubious distinction of being the least populated incorporated city in Iowa; with the increase in the 2010 census it now shares that distinction with Le Roy, Iowa.
In 1881 a town company laid it out as a village.
A post office was established in 1882 and closed in 1993.
A post office was established in 1882 and closed in 1993.
The town was incorporated on January 18, 1990.

event.title: opened by Charles Hyde and David Vredenburg in 1930

data.event: The Hy-Vee grocery chain has its origin in the Beaconsfield Supply Store, a general store opened by Charles Hyde and David Vredenburg in 1930.
On May 23, 1981, a tornado touched down southwest of Beaconsfield for 15.9 miles.
